system.biography:
TitleFFF 118-1 Scout SB
Birthday15 Peonu 674
AppearanceAge 45, height 6’, heavy frame, weight 187 lb, average appearance, fair complexion, brown hair, grey eyes
Medical/PsycheNone
Size7
ArmorBlack leather tunic, leggings, calf boots and hat; quilt coudes & vambraces, heavy wool cloak with hood; spear, longknife, dagger, short bow and quiver (20 arrows)
Other EquipmentBelt pouch
Valuables93d in silver in a money pouch
Notes

Biography

In 712TR, Sir Morgal Rintaran created an elite force of skilled hunters and woodsmen, personally trained and well equipped. Dubbing the group his Rangers, their mission is emergency response to fire, injury or other calamity in the vast forests surrounding the Earl of Vemion’s holdings. The Rangers are handpicked freemen and serfs from Vemionshire [Minarsas 29]. Lavro is from Onris Manor, just northwest of the Ranger base at Erthen. He has been a member of the Rangers since their creation.

A wealthy villein, Lavro owns many sheep and has a large extended family including three sons. Now that his sons are in their twenties, Lavro feels comfortable putting them in charge of the farm and going off for long periods of time. Since his wife died two years ago, Lavro has volunteered for several extended stints with the Rangers. A lifelong shepherd, he is well experienced at tracking down lost animals and killing wolves and foxes with his bow. He is an expert tracker and crack shot.

Sir Morgal knows Lavro well and considers him one of his foremost scouts. He frequently chooses him for missions requiring quick thinking and independent action. Because of this, Lavro is used to travelling and working with nobles. He was handpicked to escort the Earl to Baseta Keep. Sir Morgal has arranged with the Bailiff of Onris for him to be gone for several months. In addition, the Constable has given the scout a warrant signed and sealed by the Earl of Vemion himself stating that Lavro is travelling on his business and with his leave. Although he can’t read it, Lavro is well aware of the effect the document has on others.

An experienced traveller, Lavro has been to Qualdris and Kolorn with the Earl. Tashal is big, but does not intimidate him. If anything, the big, tough villein may be a bit overconfident. He believes that the warrant from the Earl will get him out of any problem with the law, something that is not really true.

Adventure Hooks

The Eyes and Ears. Lavro is the eyes and ears of the group. He ranges ahead, looking out for brigands. He comes back with word of an ambush ahead. He volunteers to take the PCs and attack the ambushers from behind. Can the PCs keep up with this skilled woodsman?

Poachers. PCs are notorious for not obeying the rules. They have been poaching in the forest. Lavro leads a group of Rangers determined to arrest them.

The Woodsman. The PCs are hired to wipe out a gargun swarm in the area. They need additional men. Lavro offers to help, with his Bailiff’s permission.

Credits

This character is taken from “Friends, Foes, and Followers, Vol. 1” on Lythia.com (https://www.lythia.com/game_aides/friends-foes-followers-volume-1/), by Kerry Mould, with illustrations by Richard Luscheck and Juha Makkonen, and is “fanon”, a derivative work of copyrighted material by Columbia Games Inc. and N. Robin Crossby.
